statements: SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment_metrics;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, fulfillment_status FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE customer_id = 1234 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM order_fulfillment_metrics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 5;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS avg_total_amount FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE fulfillment_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE order_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE fulfillment_status = 'Complete';
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment_metrics ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM order_fulfillment_metrics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment_metrics;
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE fulfillment_status = 'pending';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM order_fulfillment_metrics ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM order_fulfillment_metrics GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_orders > 1;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY metric_name ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, fulfillment_status FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE fulfillment_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM order_fulfillment_metrics WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM order_fulfillment_metrics ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM order_fulfillment_metrics GROUP BY customer_name HAVING order_count > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM order_fulfillment_metrics ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM order_metrics WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT order_id, customer_id, quantity FROM order_metrics WHERE status = 'processed'
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM order_metrics WHERE order_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_metrics WHERE performance_rating > 4.5
SELECT * FROM order_metrics WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, quantity FROM order_metrics WHERE product_id = 2001 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_metrics GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM employee_metrics GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM order_details;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM order_details WHERE total_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_phone = '1234567890';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_details ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, shipping_status, delivery_date FROM fulfillment_metrics WHERE shipping_cost < 10 AND shipping_method = 'Standard';
SELECT * FROM order_details ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_details WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, shipping_status, delivery_date FROM fulfillment_metrics WHERE shipping_cost > 10 AND shipping_method ='Express';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_price FROM order_details JOIN customer_details ON order_details.customer_id = customer_details.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, item_total FROM order_items JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT order_id, status, last_update FROM fulfillment_status WHERE status = 'processing';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, status, last_update FROM fulfillment_status ORDER BY last_update DESC;
